Package org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler

Class IntraSchedulerRandomScore

java.lang.Object
org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler.IntraSchedulerSimple
org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler.IntraSchedulerLeastRequested
org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler.IntraSchedulerRandomScore
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatacenterEntity, Identifiable, Nameable, IntraScheduler
public class IntraSchedulerRandomScore extends IntraSchedulerLeastRequested
The intra-scheduler that extends the IntraSchedulerLeastRequested class. It has changed the score calculation method to random score. So that the intra-scheduler is like schedule the instances to the suitable host randomly.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Anonymous

    • IntraSchedulerRandomScore

      public IntraSchedulerRandomScore(int id, int firstPartitionId, int partitionNum)
      Construct the intra-scheduler with the id, the first partition id and the partition number.
      Parameters:
      id - the intra-scheduler id.
      firstPartitionId - the first synchronization partition id.
      partitionNum - the number of partitions in the data center.

  • Method Details

    • getScoreForHost

      protected double getScoreForHost(Instance instance, int hostId, SynState synState)
      The score is calculated by the random score. Note that the score also will be cached in the scoreHostHistoryMap.
      Overrides:
      getScoreForHost in class IntraSchedulerLeastRequested
      Parameters:
      instance - the instance to be scheduled.
      hostId - the id of the host.
      synState - the synchronization state.
      Returns:
      the score for the host.
